attributes.action: Donate the fuel duty raised as a direct result of the Wotten Bassett bike run on the 14th March to the Afgan Heroes Charity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am suggesting that the fuel duty raised as a direct result of those attending the wotten bassett bike run on the 14th march be donated to the afgan heroes charity.this can easily be calculated by a simple web site where those attending enter their postcode and registation number along with the miles per gallon of their bike.this would effectively enhance everyones donation to the charity on the day and raise much needed funds for our injured soldiers and help with there rehabilitation.
